name: counter-analytics
tagline: A privacy-first web analytics platform that tracks visits without cookies
description: Counter is a privacy-first, self-hosted web analytics platform that tracks visits without cookies. It offers basic stats with a lightweight footprint and focuses entirely on privacy and simplicity.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Track visits without cookies or personal data. Respect user privacy completely

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal footprint with fast page loads. No performance impact

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Basic stats that matter without complexity. Focus on essentials

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your analytics data. Your data stays yours
